mapper.insert: insert into USERS(USER_ID, USER_PASSWORD, USER_NAME, USER_GENDER, USER_DATE, USER_PHONE, USER_JOIN, DEPT_NO, TEAM_NO, POSITION_NO, ROLE_NO) values(#{user_id},#{user_password},#{user_name},#{user_gender},#{user_date},#{user_phone},#{user_join},#{dept_no},#{team_no},#{position_no},5)
mapper.select: select USER_ID, USER_PASSWORD, USER_NAME, USER_GENDER, USER_DATE, USER_PHONE, USER_JOIN, DEPT_NO, TEAM_NO, POSITION_NO from USERS where USER_ID=#{user_id} AND USER_PASSWORD=#{user_password}
mapper.update: update USERS set USER_PASSWORD=#{user_password}, USER_PHONE=#{user_phone} where USER_ID=#{user_id}
